column1: {{quote|And here in Rivendell there live still some of his chief foes: the Elven-wise
column2: lords of the Eldar from beyond the furthest seas. They do not fear the Ringwraiths
column3: for those who have dwelt in the Blessed Realm live at once in both worlds
column4: and against both the Seen and the Unseen they have great power.|[[Many Meetings]]}}

column1: All things in [[Arda]] fall into the realm of either the Seen or the [[Unseen]].
The Seen are material objects and living
column2: breathing creatures. However strong personalities like [[Calaquendi|High Elves]] had also a different form in the Unseen realm.
